title: Get BRAND-belongs-to-company Relationship
description:
* The ›belongs-to-company‹ relationship for the selected BRAND is returned when one exists. -> Status Code \`200\`
* The response contains the relationship ID and the two node IDs, but not the nodes itself.
* An empty response is returned when the the selected BRAND has no ›belongs-to-company‹ relationship. -> Status Code \`200\`
* Requests with invalid ID are rejected. This can happen when there exists no node with the given ID or it is not a BRAND. -> Status Code \`404\`
